english: This was the culture from which i sprang .
chinese: 这就是我投胎的精神文明。

english: Oh , looks like the reincarnation ceremony ' s over
chinese: 哦,看起来转世投胎的仪式好了

english: When you ' re born again , be the son of a rich family
- okay , what about reincarnation ? - not at all
Okay , what about reincarnation ? - not at all

chinese: 投胎造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He just had the rotten luck of being born in the wrong century
chinese: 他只不过是投胎投错了时代

english: No afterlife , no reincarnation , no angels with harps
chinese: 没有来生,不能投胎转世看不到拿着竖琴的天使

english: The next life of the fierce robber
chinese: 那位强盗投胎换骨出生的

english: That if l died and came back . .
That if l died and came back . .
That if l died and came back
